home.headline: Hi! I'm Intooda
home.description: I’m your guide to setting up business in Luxembourg in weeks. Prepare for a busy calendar!

about.title: About
about.headline: Let me introduce Luxembourg
about.description: Setting up a business in Luxembourg offers foreign companies a strategic gateway to Europe and a host of business advantages. With its stable political environment, robust economy, and international outlook, Luxembourg is an ideal location for companies aiming to expand and thrive in the European market.

card.title: Political and economic stability
card.description: Luxembourg is renowned for its political and social stability, supported by a strong legal framework and a AAA credit rating.

card.title: Favorable tax system
card.description: The country’s business-friendly tax regime includes low corporate tax rates, no withholding tax on dividends to EU countries, and double tax treaties with over 80 countries.

card.title: Market and talent access
card.description: Luxembourg provides easy access to major European markets. Its excellent education system and multicultural workforce make it an ideal base for recruiting skilled teams and reaching customers and partners across the continent.
